```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)

data_file_path <- here('data', 'aggregate_data.csv')
agg_data <- read_csv(data_file_path)

agg_data <- agg_data |> 
  mutate(c_system_abbr = case_when(
    startsWith(file, "FL") ~ "FL", 
    startsWith(file, "AZ") ~ "AZ",
    startsWith(file, "DE") ~ "DE", 
    startsWith(file, "IA") ~ "IA",
    TRUE ~ c_system_abbr
  ))

```
